title: How to Summon a Vehicle in Destiny

steps.headline: Buy a vehicle.
steps.description: If you don't have the Sparrow DLC, buy a vehicle once you have collected enough currency. Equip it, and proceed to a level.

steps.headline: In a level, press the 'Back' button to summon your Ghost.
Press and hold 'X/Square' to summon your vehicle.
steps.description: It should appear. Get on it.

steps.headline: Press 'RT' to accelerate and 'LT' to decelerate.
steps.description: Move with the left analog stick.
